TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.CHECK_USER_PROGRESS: Check what features the user has already used or learned
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.CHECK_GAME_STATE: Read a specific key from the game state (from appState.game)
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.HIGHLIGHT_UI_ELEMENT: Highlight a specific UI element to guide the user
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.CHECK_APP_STATE: Check the current state of the application
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.HIGHLIGHT_TILE: Highlight a grid tile by coordinates (frontend applies visual highlight)
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.SET_OBJECTIVE: Set or update the current tutorial objective identifier
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.UNLOCK_ABILITY: Unlock player abilities (canInteract, canCollect, canOpenChest, canFight)

TOOL_PARAM_DESCRIPTIONS.FEATURE: The feature to check progress for
TOOL_PARAM_DESCRIPTIONS.KEY: The key in game state to read (e.g., "playerPos","chestOpened","enemyHP")
TOOL_PARAM_DESCRIPTIONS.ELEMENT_ID: The ID of the UI element to highlight
TOOL_PARAM_DESCRIPTIONS.MESSAGE: Optional message to show with the highlight
TOOL_PARAM_DESCRIPTIONS.CHECK_TYPE: What aspect of app state to check
TOOL_PARAM_DESCRIPTIONS.CAN_INTERACT: Allow player to talk to NPCs (true/false)
